about.title: About me
about.p1: My name is Matthew Bonhomme, a developer passionate about web and mobile. Curious and driven, I care a lot about code quality and user experience.
about.p2: With several projects built with Java, Vue.js and Android, I build modern, performant, tailor-made solutions.
about.p3: My goal: combine creativity and technical rigor to design elegant, intuitive interfaces.
about.p4: Always eager to learn, I thrive in environments where innovation and collaboration are central.
about.quote: “Creating digital experiences that inspire and work flawlessly.”

items.title: Syntax analyzer
items.desc: Set expression interpreter using Flex and Bison: union, intersection, complement, cardinality, copy and duplicate handling. Parses, executes, and displays user expressions.

items.title: Tower of Hero
items.desc: 2D platformer game in Java (Swing). Upgrade your heroes and climb as many floors as possible by defeating monsters on each level.

items.title: Ninja Spectral
items.desc: Android mobile game published on the Play Store. Mario-like level reproduction: cross the map in one run without dying to finish the level.

hero.subtitle: Web development student, passionate about creative interfaces, user experience, and technical challenges. Naturally curious, I enjoy exploring new technologies and pushing my limits.
